12.content:
Kirika was sitting in her room of the Eiken club when all of a sudden her stomach growled loudly. Kirika rubbed her stomach and said "God I'm starving, I need to find something to eat." She searched around the club for food and found a cabinet full of junk food. She tore it opened and ate whatever she could eat without suffocating. She kept eating until her shirt pressed out from her bigger boobs and stomach and when she felt her shirt tightening there was only one thing that went threw her head

"Holy crap my tits are getting bigger" She took a minute to feel her bigger boobs and she was still oblivious to her bigger stomach. She kept eating until her shirt threatened to rip until........
12.title: Kirika

choices: "To the supermarket? You wanted to restock, right?"
"To a buffet? It might be cheaper..."
"Back to your place? You might still have some food."
121.content:
Desunke walked in, looking up from a clipboard, saying "Hey, Kirika, a small issue with the fin..anc...es..." His jaw drops as he stammers "Wh..wh..what happened to you?" Kirika turns over to him and, totally ignoring what he just, says "Ah, Desunke, we're out of food! I'm going to have to go get some more, and I know who's coming with me!" At that moment, her shirt finally gave in, ripping right off, revealing her trademark bikini, which was being stretched to the limit. She then picks up Desunke, and pushes him inbetween her boobs, which have grown to such a extent that only his head is still outside of her clevage.

As she walks outside, she asks Desunke "Hey, Desunke, where should we go to eat?" Sighing, knowing he had no choice in the matter, he suggested...
